description:
Tree pruning and tree felling of TPO trees

Tree Preservation Application At:

St Pauls Steiner School, 1 St Pauls Road, Islington, London, N1 3PT

TPO Reference:

LBI TPO (No.326) 2007

T1A – Robinia (LBI T8) 
T1 -  Lime (LBI T1)
T2 -  Lime (LBI T2)
T3 -  Lime (LBI T3)
T4 -  Horse Chestnut (LBI T4)
T5 -  Lime (LBI T5)
T6 -  Lime (LBI T6)
T7 -  Horse Chestnut (LBI T7)
T8 -  Horse Chestnut (LBI T9)
T9 -  Horse Chestnut (LBI T10)
T10 – Lime (LBI T11)
T11 – Lime (street tree) No work
T12 – Sycamore (LBI T12)
T13 -  Horse Chestnut (LBI T13)
T13A - Sycamore (LBI T13A)
T14 -  Sycamore (LBI T14)
T15 -  Lime (LBI T15)
T16 -  Sycamore (LBI T17)
T17 -  Sycamore (LBI T18)

PO Number:

T100221

Work specifications:

T1A – Robinia (LBI T8) = Cut back from street light, deadwood and a 10 % crown thin
T1 -  Lime (LBI T1)= Remove deadwood and lift epicormic to 6m
T2 -  Lime (LBI T2)= Remove deadwood and lift epicormic to 5m
T3 -  Lime (LBI T3)= Remove deadwood and lift epicormic to 5m 
T4 -  Horse Chestnut (LBI T4)= No work
T5 -  Lime = (LBI T5) Remove deadwood and lift epicormic to 6m
T6 -  Lime = (LBI T6) 30 % crown reduction and lift epicormic to 5m and deadwood
T7 -  Horse Chestnut (LBI T7) = No work
T8 -  Horse Chestnut (LBI T9) = Fell
T9 -  Horse Chestnut (LBI T10) = Lift crown to 7m over highway and deadwood
T10 – Lime (LBI T11) = 20 % crown reduction and deadwood
T11 – Lime (street tree) No work 
T12 – Sycamore (LBI 12)= No work
T13 -  Horse Chestnut (LBI 13)= Crown lift to 7m and deadwood 
T13A – Sycamore (LBI 13A)= 30 % crown reduction, 50 % reduction of lateral on N/E side
T14 -  Sycamore (LBI 14)= 30 % crown reduction and deadwood
T15 -  Lime (LBI 15) = 25 % crown reduction and deadwood
T16 -  Sycamore (LBI T17) = Deadwood
T17 -  Sycamore (LBI T18) No work


Decision:

Approve Subject to conditions
